author: Ravi Sharma
title: PM Narendra Modi breaks down while talking about his mother
text:
NEW DELHI: PM Narendra Modi became visibly emotional while answering a question on the hardships his mother as he grew up. 

The Prime Minister revealed that his mother Heeraben Modi raised him and his siblings as a single parent after the death of his father. While talking about how his mother used to clean dishes at other's homes, fill water and perform hard chores, the Prime Minister teared up. 

So you can imagine what a mother had to do to raise her children and the difficulties she must have gone through. He said his mother's is not the only case where an Indian mother who made great sacrifices to bring their children up despite many difficulties.
#ModiAtFacebook PM @narendramodi talks about his mother. pic.twitter.com/VRpa2ojuIW 
— Times of India (@timesofindia) September 27, 2015 
#ModiAtFacebook Standing ovation for PM @narendramodi after he shared stories of his mother's struggle pic.twitter.com/L47Po7YaTK 
— Times of India (@timesofindia) September 27, 2015 
He added that his mother, who is now 90 years old and still does all her work herself, keeps track of major global happenings using the TV, despite her lack of education.
